content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining System at position(41.0, -82.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (41.0, -82.0)
- Storage chest (41.5, -80.5) containing coal
- Burner inserter (41.5, -79.5) moving items from drill to chest

### Iron Production Line at position(-28.0, -61.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (iron ore) (-28.0, -61.0)
- Storage chest (-27.5, -59.5)
- Burner inserter (-26.5, -59.5)
- Stone furnace (-25.0, -59.0)
- Burner inserter (-23.5, -58.5)
- Storage chest (-22.5, -58.5) containing iron plates and copper plates

### Copper Production Line at position(-18.0, -53.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (-18.0, -53.0)
- Storage chest (-17.5, -51.5)
- Burner inserter (-16.5, -51.5)
- Stone furnace (-15.0, -51.0)
- Burner inserter (-13.5, -50.5)
- Storage chest (-12.5, -50.5) containing iron plates

### Power Generation System
Consists of:
- Steam engine (-4.5, 12.5)
- Boiler (-4.5, 16.0)
- Offshore pump (-3.5, 27.5)
- Multiple pipe groups connecting water system
- Electricity network (id=10222) connecting various entities

### Automation Science Pack Production at position(8.5, 13.5)
Consists of:
- Input chest (5.5, 13.5)
- Burner inserter (6.5, 13.5)
- Assembling machine (8.5, 13.5)
- Output chest (11.5, 13.5) containing automation science packs
- Burner inserter (10.5, 13.5)
- Additional storage chest (8.5, 10.5)
- Multiple belt groups for item transport

### Research Lab System
Consists of:
- Lab with automation research in progress
- Input inserter system for science packs

ERROR TIPS

### Fuel Management Errors
- Ensure sufficient coal is collected before attempting to refuel entities
- Check entity fuel levels regularly to prevent "out of fuel" states
- Keep a minimum coal buffer in inventory for refueling operations

### Resource Extraction Errors
- Verify presence of required items in storage chests before attempting extraction
- Check storage chest contents through inventory inspection before extraction attempts

### Power System Issues
- Monitor power system status regularly to prevent production stoppages
- Ensure continuous fuel supply to boiler to maintain power generation
- Keep track of steam engine and boiler connection status

### Production Line Errors
- Verify all required ingredients are available before starting production
- Ensure proper power supply to assembling machines
- Monitor input/output chest contents regularly

### Entity Connection Issues
- Verify fluid connections between offshore pump, boiler, and steam engine
- Ensure electricity network properly connects all powered entities
- Check belt connections for proper item flow between production stages
